name: Quantum Software
description:
Quantum is an industry leader in providing SAP Business One software to emerging businesses that seek to benefit from the world's leading business management applications. As a leading reseller of SAP Business One we are in the unique position of being able to provide top-tier support and service for one of the world's dynamic software applications.
Building on our experience in the marketplace, we've developed The BizBlocks Management Suite to cater to the needs of those companies with a strong desire to grow, but with limited capital to do so.
